_header: O Rex regum in thy realm celestial
Subjects: Stanley, house of; Flodden Field, battle of; Brampton, battle of; historical poems
_description: The House of Stanley: The Battle of Brampton, or Flodden Field — twenty-six stanzas rhyme royal

BLHar2252.First Lines:
O Rex Regnum in thy Reallme CelestyallGloryfied with gawdis of
                    gabryellis company…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…I me submyte to your cherytabyll corectyonAnd yn þus man
                    shalbe my conclusyon
BLHar2252.Editions:
Dolman,  A. 
             “Ancient Ballads on the Battle of Flodden Field.” 
             Gentleman’s Magazine
         221
            (1886): 16.
